EmailTemplate.name: Enrolment Verification Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Enrolment Verification Letter - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please find attached your enrolment verification letter which you recently requested.
The original copy of this letter is ready to be collected from our office. OR The original copy of this letter has been posted to you. OR Please kindly nominate the postal address so that we can post the original letter to you.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
